'''''Let the Wind Lead''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''.

To complete this achievement, the player needs to resonate with {{Anemo}} at a [[Statue of The Seven]] in [[Mondstadt]] for the first time (which is done during the {{Quest|Bird's Eye View}}), and then complete the {{Quest|Unexpected Power}}.
